survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Autonomous Vehicle Features Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and concerns regarding features in autonomous vehicles to guide future development and marketing strategies.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with autonomous vehicle technology?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clear response selection.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with autonomous vehicle technology?

questions.question_text: Which of the following autonomous vehicle features are most important to you? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Limit selections to 3 to prioritize preferences.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with max selections set to 3.

script.question_text: Which of the following autonomous vehicle features are most important to you? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: What concerns, if any, do you have about autonomous vehicles?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What concerns, if any, do you have about autonomous vehicles?

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a premium for an autonomous vehicle with advanced safety features?
answer_options: Yes, but only a small premium
No, I would not pay extra
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Safety systems' in Q2.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button. Route only to respondents who prioritized safety features.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE). Routing condition: if 'Safety systems' is selected in Q2.

script.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a premium for an autonomous vehicle with advanced safety features?
answer_options: Yes, but only a small premium
No, I would not pay extra
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Safety systems' in Q2.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to consider purchasing an autonomous vehicle in the next 5 years?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button. This question gauges market readiness.
